name: materialMatchMachine
code: (actionStr)=>{try{let constructor=getConstructor(actionStr);if(constructor==='$material'){let query=getQuery(actionStr);let materialInclusions=$metrics.materialCompatibility.include;if (!materialInclusions.includes(query)) { console.error(`${query} does not work with ${$machine.name}.`);return false;}}return true;}catch(e){console.log('Cannot enforce material matches machine.');return true;}}
